name: Winter Quest v0.0
description:
A playable, but not finishable build for a game for the 2021 Winter GameDev Unlocked game jam.

Just explore around; the only NPC you can interact with is the dude in his underwear.

WASD+ and mousey controls.

Alt+F4 to quit when you're done (or get stuck).

Let me know what you think! Taking a little break from it for now, but there's a LOT I want to do to improve and finish it!
